name: Flamecaller Zazrak
location: [[Muggy Plains]], south of the [[Temple of Equilibrium]] ([[Zao]]), {{Mapper Coords|129.161|121.249|7|2|text=here}}, and on the mountain north of [[Chaochai]], {{Mapper Coords|129.227|121.177|6|2|text=here}}.
strategy:
Kill it quickly, since it can be annoying with its strong attacks, invisibility and fast self-healing. Area runes and spells are useful to use against this creature to cancel its commonly used invisibility.
Paladins should be 80+ with assassin stars before trying to solo, but it's better to kill with a partner if you're under level 100.
Knights should use chase opponent option and use [[Fierce Berserk]] and [[Great Health Potion]] when needed. Lower leveled mages should kill using [[Sudden Death Rune]]s and [[Avalanche]] as well as [[Mana Shield]].
